title: AmazType: Amazon book search visualizer
content:
[![AmazType - a Typographic Book Search](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012144729im_/http:/farm3.static.flickr.com/2283/2208814023_be38314c8c.jpg)](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012144729/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/joepemberton/2208814023/ "AmazType - a Typographic Book Search by Joe Pemberton, on Flickr")

[amaztype](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012144729/http:/amaztype.tha.jp/) is a cool little mashup tool that creates a visualizer for Amazon's book search.
author: Joe Pemberton
